comment: He is a young, rather recent graduate of KSU himself, and therefore can understand the mindset of a student. The class is not challenging at all as long as you pay attention in class, do you assignments, and study about 30 minutes for every test. Take this for stats. Easy A and a great guy.
David Sowisdral is the BEST teacher you could ever have for any math you can take. Detailed notes. Graded homework are easy points. No book necessary unless he says so and he's cool and very helpful.

Professor Sowisdral is a young, friendly, and smart guy who gives you every chance to succeed! The class is not challenging at all, but your grade can drop if you do not do your assignments. Keep up with you work and you will get an A!
Im terrible in math and i pulled an A. This was the easiest class ive ever taken. Hes so laid back and helpful. You get so much extra credit and the test are muiltple choice Take Him!

David Sowisdral is a very down to earth person who wants his students to learn. Attend the lectures and the review sessions. If you don't make a good grade its your own fault because he gives you plenty of chances to pass, whether you take advantage of those opportunities is up to the student. He is very understanding and willing to help you out

Prof. Sowisdral is awesome, young guy who is laid back and gives good examples and opportunities for extra credit. Tests and quizzes arent that hard if you study. I left half of the final blank, got a 53, and still made a B in the class. Has 4 graded hw assignments which help your grade a lot. Gives extra credit thats easy to get.

Not a hard class, I barely showed up and failed the final and still got a B. He's very friendly and willing to adjust hours to fit you. If you try in his class, he will meet you halfway. He drops your lowest quiz grade and takes hw grades. opportunities for bonuses is abundant. Sowie Wowie is great!

He is very straight forward and clear about what you need to know for quizzes and tests and gives multiple opportunities to get an A besides just tests. Also gives extra credit and is always willing to help. I would definitely take him again.
He is a very good professor, he is clear and increadibly nice. His grading system is easy to understand and makes the class fairly easy.

GREAT TEACHER!I'm horrible at math and he really tries to help his students out. His grading system makes it very hard to not pass the class. All his quizzes are announced so no excuses for not knowing. There really isn't anything bad to say about him. I'd take him if I needed another math.
This professor is really straight forward about class. He wants you to succeed, and makes it easy for you to do so!
Excellent! Super easy! Notes posted on Vista! Gives you extra  points through his method of grading. Very hard to fail this class! Got out early in his summer class!
Take him if you can! He is a great professor. Posts all notes on Vista before class. Goes over homework in the first half of class. He is definitely the best math professor I've had.
Excellent Professor!  Math can be an intimidating subject for non-math majors, but he was sure to break down the explanations until we understood.  Would definitely take him again!
This is the best math Professor KSU has. If your not good at math take him he will try to help you understand so you can pass. He really cares about his students and he is a really nice guy.

We had 3 graded HW assignments, 3 tests and 10% for attendance. This class was a joke. Professor Sowisdral does not BS around, he realizes this is a general education course and I appreciae that. TAKE HIM!!

TAKE HIM. He's like 25, laid back, and chill. Straightforward and easy to understand. 3 homework assignments, which he basically walks you through in class. Posts his notes, which are also easy to understand. Never ending flow of extra credit. Tests are super easy. Final non-comprehensive, however he won't let you exempt it either.

posts all notes and lets class out after a half an hour or so. gives extra credit and doesn't use the book. however, he answers his own questions, and only has 3 homework assignments. good if you're average in math, but if it's not your specialty and want to learn, then pick someone else. still, a pretty easy grade if you work for it.
He posted notes before class. He is 25, so he didn't want to be in class all day either. Over all, best math teacher!

Great teacher. Always willing to help his students during class or office hours. There is no reason for anyone to get less than an A.I made an A+ on every test and needed 13 points on the finals to get an A in the class which I did!
great guy, he wants you to do well so he helps you understand material and gives extra credit..doesnt try to trick you...definitly would take him again

Every other comment sums it up greatly.  He just graduated recently and is only like 25.  For that reason he cares.  He gives you, 7 quizes (drops 1) 3 tests, and a final (and just a few small hw assignments).  He offers an option if you completely fail a test.  I wish he wasn't still in school and I could take him again for an upper level course.

TAKE HIS CLASS!!!! He is so nice and fun to talk to. Especially if you love sports. He gives you optional homework, but does have graded homework the night before a test. His tests are not that bad and the quizzes are a peace of cake. He explains things so clearly, i learned more in this class then i did all through high school combined.

TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!!! He is a very clear teacher. His quizzes and homework are very easy. The tests aren't bad either. He is always available to help you with anything. He explains everything clearly in class. He definitely knows the material he is teaching. He gives lots of extra credit on all tests, quizzes, and homework!

He is excellent. More than willing to help with any question or concern you may have. Office hours are very convenient. He is very easy to understand and it makes sense. If you get a chance to take his class I would do it!

He is very nice, and very helpful. Explains things clearly. A set of graded homework problems turned in before each test. He is only too happy to answer questions. Goess through homework problems students ask to go through if they've had trouble. There's s review day before each test. You're not going to find a better math class. I recommend him!

Extremely nice guy. willing to help as mch as can. He is always in his office for assistance. Gives you tons of opportunities to boost your grade with bonus questions and graded homework assignments turned in before each test that come from your book. TAKE HIM IF YOU GET THE CHANCE !
